products.title: ZANUSSI MultiFlow ZRME38FW2 Tall Fridge White
products.description:
Multiflow technology

The Zanussi MultiFlow ZRME38FW2 Tall Fridge uses Multiflow technology to keep
consistent air circulation throughout the fridge, which helps maintain an even temperature and
reduces cold spots. This helps to keep your food fresher for longer.

Fast freeze

The fast freeze function rapidly lowers the temperature within the fridge, ideal for quickly chilling
large shops or food that needs to be cooled quickly.

Salad crisper drawer

Keep your fruit and vegetables fresher for longer with the salad crisper drawer. This drawer provides
an ideal storage environment for fresh produce by regulating humidity levels.

specs.dimensions: 186 x 59.5 x 64.5 cm (H x W x D)

features: Food freshness feature to keep your fruit and veg fresh
